metadata.name: penny pincher
metadata.description:
[i]"A challenge about being economic enough to collect 99 cents on 7 Basement floors!"[/i]
Adds a brand new challenge to the game!
[b]Character:[/b] The Keeper
[b]Starting items:[/b] Sack of Pennies, Money = Power, Deep Pockets, Head of the Keeper, Eye of Greed, Dad's Lost Coin, Crooked Penny, Greed's Gullet, Store Key, Ace of Diamonds and The Fool card.
[b]Conditions:[/b] [list] [*]Infinite Basement Seed Effect. [*]The Keeper dies after 7 floors (Basement VIII onwards). [*]No curses. [*]No Dice or Sacrifice Rooms. [*]2 of Diamonds cards are replaced with Ace of Diamonds. [*]The Coupon cannot be found in its item pools. [*]Enemy projectiles cause you to lose coins (like Greed or a Hanger). [/list]
[b]Goal:[/b] buy a Trophy that costs 99 cents and is located on every Starting Room of every floor.
Art by Aczom and code by Strawrat.
[IMG]https://bindingofisaacrebirth.gamepedia.com/media/bindingofisaacrebirth.gamepedia.com/6/6d/Coin.png?version=09b9523fbf8638611e8841e056ea6360[/IMG] [IMG]https://bindingofisaacrebirth.gamepedia.com/media/bindingofisaacrebirth.gamepedia.com/6/6d/Coin.png?version=09b9523fbf8638611e8841e056ea6360[/IMG] [IMG]https://bindingofisaacrebirth.gamepedia.com/media/bindingofisaacrebirth.gamepedia.com/6/6d/Coin.png?version=09b9523fbf8638611e8841e056ea6360[/IMG]
